restlib.net

Class IRI

  • java.lang.Object
    • restlib.net.IRI
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Uri

    @Immutable
public class IRI
extends Object
    A representation of an International Resource Identifier as defined in RFC3987.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String authority()
      Returns the authority component of the IRI or the empty string if absent.
      static IRIBuilder builder()
      Returns a new IRIBuilder instance.
      IRI canonicalize()
      Returns the canonical version of this IRI.
      boolean equals(Object obj) 
      String fragment()
      Returns the fragment component of the IRI or the empty string if absent.
      int hashCode() 
      String host()
      Returns the host component of the IRI or the empty string if absent.
      boolean isAbsolute()
      Returns true if the IRI instance is an absolute IRI.
      static IRI parse(CharSequence input)
      Parses an IRI from its String representation.
      Path path()
      Returns the path component of the IRI.
      Optional<Integer> port()
      Returns the port component of the IRI if present.
      String query()
      Returns the query component of the IRI or the empty string if absent.
      static IRI relativeReference(IRI base, IRI relative)
      Returns the results of performing the reference resolution of relative against base per the rules defined in section 5 of RFC3986.
      String scheme()
      Returns the scheme component of the IRI or the empty string if absent.
      IRI toIRI()
      Returns an instance of this IRI encoded as an IRI.
      String toString() 
      Uri toUri()
      Returns an instance of this IRI encoded as a URI.
      String userinfo()
      Returns the userinfo component of the IRI or the empty string if absent.

        clone, finalize, getClass, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • builder

        public static IRIBuilder builder()
        Returns a new IRIBuilder instance.

      • parse

        public static IRI parse(CharSequence input)
        Parses an IRI from its String representation.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if input is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if input is not parseable.

      • relativeReference

        public static IRI relativeReference(IRI base,
                    IRI relative)
        Returns the results of performing the reference resolution of relative against base per the rules defined in section 5 of RFC3986.
        Parameters:
        base - an absolute IRI.
        relative - a non-null IRI.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if base or relative are null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if base is not an absolute IRI.

      • authority

        public final String authority()
        Returns the authority component of the IRI or the empty string if absent.

      • canonicalize

        public IRI canonicalize()
        Returns the canonical version of this IRI.

        Note if the scheme component of this IRI is empty, this method returns the same IRI.

      • equals

        public final boolean equals(@Nullable
             Object obj)
        Overrides:
        equals in class Object

      • fragment

        public final String fragment()
        Returns the fragment component of the IRI or the empty string if absent.

      • hashCode

        public final int hashCode()
        Overrides:
        hashCode in class Object

      • host

        public final String host()
        Returns the host component of the IRI or the empty string if absent.

      • isAbsolute

        public final boolean isAbsolute()
        Returns true if the IRI instance is an absolute IRI.

      • path

        public final Path path()
        Returns the path component of the IRI.

      • port

        public Optional<Integer> port()
        Returns the port component of the IRI if present.

      • query

        public String query()
        Returns the query component of the IRI or the empty string if absent.

      • scheme

        public final String scheme()
        Returns the scheme component of the IRI or the empty string if absent.

      • toIRI

        public final IRI toIRI()
        Returns an instance of this IRI encoded as an IRI. This method is useful for decoding instances of URI into internationalized IRIs.

      • toString

        public final String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object

      • toUri

        public final Uri toUri()
        Returns an instance of this IRI encoded as a URI.

      • userinfo

        public final String userinfo()
        Returns the userinfo component of the IRI or the empty string if absent.
